NA, BDAG BCOM LDAN 'DAS GANG NA BA DER 'GRO BAR BYA'O SNYAM DU
SEMS SO, ,DE NAS TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU BCOM LDAN 'DAS
GANG NA BA DER NYE BAR SONG STE, NYE BAR SONG NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS
KYI ZHABS LA SPYI

BOS PHYAG BYAS TE PHYOGS GCIG TU 'DUG GO, ,PHYOGS GCIG TU 'DUG
NAS TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BUS DGE SLONG ZHES BOS NAS TSE
DANG LDAN PA DAG 'DI NA DGE SLONG TSUL KHRIMS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
YANG YIN, TING NGE 'DZIN PHUN SUM TSOGS PA YANG YIN, SHES RAB
PHUN SUM TSOGS

@69B PA YANG YIN LA, DE YANG DANG YANG DU 'DU SHES DANG TSOR BA
'GOG PA LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DANG LDANG BA'I GNAS DE YOD DO ZHES
BYA BA YANG DAG PA JI LTA BA BZHIN RAB TU SHES SO ZHES BYA BA
NAS, YANG DAG JI LTA BA BZHIN RAB TU SHES SO ZHES BYA BA'I BAR
DU'O, ,DE NAS DE'I TSE

DE'I DUS NA TSE DANG LDAN PA 'CHAR BYED 'KHOR DE'I NANG NA 'DUG
PAR GYUR TO, ,DE NAS TSE DANG LDAN PA 'CHAR BYED KYIS TSE DANG
LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU LA 'DI SKAD CES SMRAS SO, ,DGE SLONG GNAS MA
YIN ZHING GO SKABS MED DE YID LAS BYUNG BA'I LHA'I LUS GANG YANG
RUNG BA ZHIG TU SKYES NAS YANG DANG YANG

DU 'DU SHES DANG TSOR BA 'GOG PA LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DANG LDANG
BA 'DI NI GNAS MED CING YANG DAG PA JI LTA BA BZHIN SHES PA 'DI
NI GNAS MED DO ZHES DE LTAR LAN GNYIS LAN GSUM DU SMRAS SO, ,DE
NAS TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU 'DI SNYAM DU STON PA'I MDUN DU
YANG BDAG GIS BSHAD PA LA DGE SLONG

'DI PHYIR ZLOG PAR BYED KHONG KHRO BAR BYED CING TSANGS PAR
MTSUNGS PAR SPYOD PA RNAMS KYANG BDAG GIS BSHAD PA LA, RJES SU YI
RANG BAR MI BYED PAS BDAG CANG MI SMRA BAR BYA'O SNYAM NAS, DE
NAS TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU CANG MI SMRA BAR GYUR TO, ,DE
NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS TSE DANG LDAN PA 'CHAR

BYED LA BOS TE, 'CHAR BYED KHYOD KYIS YID LAS BYUNG BA'I LHA'I
LUS GANG YANG RUNG BA GANG YIN PAR SHES, BTZUN PA JI SRID DU
GZUGS CAN MA YIN PA LHA 'DU SHES CAN DE DAG MA LAGS SAM, SKYES BU
RMONGS PA LONG BA KHYOD MIG DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG SH'A RI'I BU
DANG LHAN CIG CHOS MNGON PA DANG

'DUL BA'I GTAM BYA BAR SEMS SAM ZHES DE NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS
TSE DANG LDAN PA 'CHAR BYED LA MNGON SUM DU SPYOS NAS TSE DANG
LDAN PA KUN DGA' BO LA BOS TE, KUN DGA' BO KHYOD KYANG DGE SLONG
GNAS BRTAN RNAMS LA RNAM PAR GTZES PA BTANG SNYOMS SU BYED DAM,
SKYES BU CHEN PO

DGE SLONG GNAS BRTAN GTZES PA LA SNYING RJE YANG MA SKYES SAM
ZHES DE NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS TSE DANG LDAN PA 'CHAR BYED DANG,
TSE DANG LDAN PA KUN DGA' BO LA MNGON SUM DU SPYOS NAS, DGE SLONG
RNAMS LA BOS TE, 'DI NA DGE SLONG TSUL KHRIMS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
YANG YIN, TING NGE 'DZIN

@70A *, ,PHUN SUM TSOGS PA YANG YIN, SHES RAB PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
YANG YIN LA DE YANG DANG YANG DU 'DU SHES DANG TSOR BA 'GOG PA LA
SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DANG LDANG BA'I GNAS DE YOD DO ZHES YANG DAG
PA JI LTA BA BZHIN DU RAB TU SHES SO, ,DE MTHONG BA'I CHOS KHO NA
LA

DANG PO NYID DU KUN SHES PA THOB PAR YANG MI BYED CING 'CHI BA'I
DUS KYI TSE YANG YIN LA, LUS ZHIG NAS KYANG KHAM GYI ZAS ZA BA'I
LHA LAS 'DAS TE YID LAS BYUNG BA'I LHA'I LUS GANG YANG RUNG BA
ZHIG TU SKYE BAR 'GYUR RO, ,DER SKYES NAS KYANG YANG DANG YANG DU
'DU SHES DANG TSOR BA 'GOG

PA LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DANG LDANG BA'I GNAS DE YOD DO ZHES YANG
DAG PA JI LTA BA BZHIN RAB TU SHES SO, ,DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL
NAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS NANG DU YANG DAG 'JIG GI PHYIR GDAN LAS
BZHENGS TE GTZUG LAG KHANG DU ZHUGS SO, ,MDO LAS MTHAR GYIS GNAS

PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DGU ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA LA, GLENG GZHI
NI MNYAN DU YOD PA NA'O, ,DGE SLONG DAG MTHAR GYIS GNAS PA'I
SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA NI DGU PO 'DI RNAMS TE, 'DOD PA LAS DBEN PA
SDIG PA MI DGE BA'I CHOS LAS DBEN PA, RTOG PA DANG BCAS DPYOD

PA DANG BCAS PA DANG DBEN PA LAS SKYES PA'I DGA' BA DANG BDE BA
CAN BSAM GTAN DANG PO NYE BAR BSGRUBS SHING GNAS TE, 'DI NI MTHAR
GYIS GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DANG PO'O, ,DE RTOG PA DANG
DPYOD PA NYE BAR ZHI NAS NANG YONGS SU DANG STE, SEMS RTZE GCIG
TU GYUR NAS RTOG PA

DANG DPYOD PA MED PA TING NGE 'DZIN LAS SKYES PA'I DGA' BA DANG
BDE BA CAN BSAM GTAN GNYIS PA NYE BAR BSGRUBS SHING GNAS TE, 'DI
NI MTHAR GYIS GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA GNYIS PA'O, ,DE DGA'
BA LAS 'DOD CHAGS DANG BRAL NAS BTANG SNYOMS SU GNAS TE, DRAN PA
DANG SHES BZHIN CAN BDE

PA LUS KYIS SO SOR MYONG LA GANG 'PHAGS PA RNAMS KYIS BTANG
SNYOMS PA'O ZHES BRJOD PA DRAN PA CAN BDE BA DANG LDAN PA BSAM
GTAN GSUM PA NYE BAR BSGRUBS SHING GNAS TE, 'DI NI MTHAR GYIS
GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA GSUM PA'O, ,DE BDE BA YANG SPANGS
SDUG BSNGAL BA YANG SPANGS SHING

@70B YID BDE BA DANG YID MI BDE BA SNGAR NYID DU NUB CING BDE BA
YANG MA YIN SDUG BSNGAL BA YANG MA YIN PA'I BTANG SNYOMS YONGS SU
DAG PA'I BSAM GTAN BZHI PA NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS SO, ,'DI NI
MTHAR GYIS GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA BZHI PA'O, ,DE RNAM PA
THAMS CAD DU GZUGS KYI

'DU SHES LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE, THOGS PA'I 'DU SHES NUB CING
SNA TSOGS KYI 'DU SHES YID LA MI BYED PAS NAM MKHA' MTHA' YAS SO
ZHES NAM MKHA' YAS SKYE MCHED NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS PA 'DI NI
LNGA PA'O, ,DE NAS RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU NAM MKHA' MTHA' YAS SKYE

MCHED LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE, RNAM SHES MTHA' YAS SO ZHES RNAM
SHES MTHA' YAS SKYE MCHED NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS PA 'DI NI DRUG
PA'O, ,DE RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU RNAM SHES MTHA' YAS SKYE MCHED LAS
YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE, CI YANG MED DO SNYAM NAS CI YANG MED PA'I
SKYE MCHED

NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS PA 'DI NI BDUN PA'O, ,DE RNAM PA THAMS
CAD DU CI YANG MED PA'I SKYA MCHED LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE 'DU
SHES MED 'DU SHES MED MIN SKYE MCHED NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS PA
'DI NI BRGYAD PA'O, ,DE RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU 'DU SHES MED 'DU
SHES MED MIN SKYE

MCHED LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS TE, 'DU SHES DANG TSOR BA 'GOG PA LUS
KYIS MNGON SUM DU BYAS SHING NYE BAR BSGRUBS TE GNAS PA 'DI NI
DGU PA STE, ,'DI NI MTHAR GYIS GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA DGU
PA'O ZHES BKA' STZAL TO, ,GSUM 'DUS PA'I REG PA DANG,

REG PA LAS BYUNG BA'I TSOR BA DANG ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA LA, JI
LTAR RE ZHIG MDZOD KYI GNAS DANG POR LAG PA BRDABS PA'I DPE'I MDO
DE DANG DE LAS 'DON PA BZHIN NO, ,MA RIG PA'I 'DUS TE REG PA LA
BRTEN TE, SKYES PA ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA LA, GLENG GZHI NI MNYAN
DU YOD

PA NA'O, ,DE NAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS SNGA DRO CHOS GOS DANG LHUNG BZED
THOGS TE MNYAN YOD DU BSOD SNYOMS KYI PHYIR ZHUGS TE, MNYAN YOD
DU BSOD SNYOMS SRUNG NAS ZAS KYI BYA BA MDZAD NAS, GSOL ZIN PA'I
'OG TU LHUNG BZED GYU STE, DGE SLONG GI DGE 'DUN GYIS MA MTHONG
ZHING NYE

@71A *, ,BAR GNAS PA'I DGE SLONG LA MA SBRAN PAR CHOS GOS DANG
LHUNG BZED BSNAMS TE, NUB PHYOGS SU LJONGS RGYU ZHING AANDA'I

NA GNAS SHING 'GRO BA NA DES BCOM LDAN 'DAS GCIG PU GNYIS SU MED

BA NYE BAR GNAS PA MED PAR CHOS GOS DANG LHUNG BZED BSNAMS TE,

RAB TU MANG PO

STON PA MIG

BZANGS ZHES BYA BA PHYI ROL MU STEGS PA RDZU 'PHRUL DANG LDAN PA
'DOD PA LAS 'DOD CHAGS DANG BRAL BA BYUNG STE, DGE SLONG DAG STON
PA MIG BZANGS KYI NYAN THOS BRGYA PHRAG DU MA DANG, NYAN THOS
STONG PHRAG DU MA DANG, NYAN THOS BRGYA STONG PHRAG DU MA BYUNG
STE, STON PA MIG BZANGS NYAN

THOS RNAMS LA SHIN TU DRI MA DANG BRAL BA DANG, TSANGS PAR SPYOD
PA YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR STON BAR MI BYED KYI, TSANGS RIS KYI LHA
DANG SKAL BA MNYAM PA STON TE, DGE SLONG DAG STON PA MIG BZANGS
KYIS NYAN THOS BSLAB BA RNAM BA THAMS CAD KYI THAMS CAD DU RDZOGS
BA DE DAG TSANGS PA'I GNAS

BZHI BSGOMS NAS 'DOD PA LA 'DUN PA'I 'DOD CHAGS SPANGS SHING PHAL
CHER GNAS TE, TSAGS PA'I 'JIG RTEN GYI LHA RNAMS DANG SKAL BA
MNYAM PAR SKYE BAR GYUR TO, ,GANG GI RNAM PA THAMS CAD KYI THAMS
CAD DU MA YIN PA DE DAG LAS KHA CIG NI GZHAN 'PHRUL DBANG BYE KYI
LHA RNAMS

DANG SKAL BA MNYAM PAR SKYE BAR 'GYUR ZHING, KHA CIG NI 'PHRUL
DGA' DANG, KHA CIG NI 'THAB BRAL DANG, KHA CIG NI SUM CU RTZA
GSUM DANG, KHA CIG NI RGYAL CHEN RIGS BZHI DANG, RGYAL RIGS SHING
S'A LA CHEN PO LTA BU RNAMS DANG, BRAM ZE'I RIGS SHING S'A LA
CHEN PO LTA BU

RNAMS DANG, KHYIM BDAG SHING S'A LA CHEN PO LTA BU RNAMS DANG
SKAL BA MNYAM PAR SKYE BAR GYUR TO, ,DE NAS STON PA MIG BZANGS
'DI SNYAM DU BDAG NYAN THOS RNAMS DANG LHAN CIG 'GRO BA DANG
SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA NI TSUL DANG MTHUN PA MA YIN GYIS BDAG GONG MA
BSAM GTAN GNYIS

LTA BU DANG, PHYAG MNYAM ZHING RING LA

ZANGS KYI MDOG LTA BU DANG, PHYAG GI RI MO ZAB CING MA 'DRES LA
MI YO ZHING THUN TSAGS MED LA SRA BA CING ZANGS KYI MDOG LTA BU
DANG SOR MO'I TSIGS PHRA ZHING MA 'KHRUGS LA DMAR BA DANG, MTHE
CHUNG SRIN LAG LAS TSAD LHAG PA DANG, BA S'U SHIN TU MANG BA MA
YIN LA PHRA ZHING 'JAM LA MNYEN LA RTZA BA

'BYOR ZHING MNYAM PA DANG, PAGS PA SNUM ZHING MA 'KHUMS LA MNYAM
PA'I SNYING PO CAN DANG, PAGS PA GRANG BA DANG, CHA BA'I REG PAS
MDOG MI 'GYUR BA DANG, SHA SNUM ZHING BRTAN LA SDUG CING HA CANG
RAGS PA MA YIN ZHING, HA CANG PHRA BA MA YIN PA DANG, KHRAG BAN
DU DZI BA KA'I ME TOG LTA BU'AM

ZANGS MDOG 'DRA ZHING SNUM ZHING 'JAM LA TZANDAN GYI DRI BSUNG
LTA BU DANG, RUS PA SHAS G-YOGS SHING BRTAN LA SHIN TU MDZES PA
DANG, RUS PA'I MTSAMS KLU MDUD PA LTAR MI MNGON PA DANG, SKU
GDUNG RDO RJE LTAR MI SHIGS SHING LEGS PAR 'DUS PA DANG, YAN LAG
SHIN TU RNAM PAR DBYES SHING

MDZES PA DANG, SKU RIM PAR 'TSAM ZHING RGYAS LA YONGS SU DAG CING
GZHON SHA CAN DANG, SBRANG BA DANG, SME BA DANG, GNAG BAG MED PA
DANG, SKUL NAD KYIS BYAS PA'I NYAM CHUNG BA MED PA DANG, SENG GE
GZIMS CHA BRTEN PAS SKU RNAM PAR G-YENGS PA DANG BRAL BA DANG,
PAGS PA RDUL DANG DRI MAS NYE

BAR NYON MONGS PA MED CING DAG PA DANG, ME DANG NOR BU DANG SMAN
CHEN PO DANG, NYI MA DANG ZLA BA LTA BU'I 'OD ZER DANG, RI RAB
LTA BU RAB TU LCI BA DANG LDAN PA DANG, DUS SU REG NA BDE BA'I
REG PA DANG LDAN PA DANG, BA SPU'I BU GA'I DRI 'JAM ZHING MNGAR
LA KU SUM DANG, TZAN DAN LTA BU'I BSUNG DANG LDAN PA DANG, ZHAL
GYI
